body:
What a fucked up family tree. MC's dad had a baby with his wife's mother then his wife so his aunt is also his older sister which means his kids will also be his cousins.

Guess that's 'Bama for you.
The art style sometimes reminds me of Nanashi or is it just me?

Kinda disappoint the doujin turned into a rape story halfway through. I wish there was more interaction between the siblings instead of the brother hell bent on knocking up his sister and completely disregarding her, completely ruined the story imo but I guess that is the artist's fetish considering everyone else is also complaining of the pseudo NTR intro lol.
The mom is so cute!
So like, his dad fucked his grandma or something?
Crow of Judgment that is the funniest comment I ever read lmaooo
And wtf was with that Kazuya level NTR thinking
Those beginning NTR chapters really almost made me just not read
what the fuck was that beginning ntr chapter? what am i reading, rent a girlfriend?
I need a part 2 cause that was good.
Can someone make a diagram for this goddamn family cuz I'm fucking confused!?
This is like Pandora's box. Open it and you will be first met with despair and darkness, but steel your will and look closer, and hope will light upon you.
This is the biggest crossover ive ever seen in doujins
Artwork Undoubtedly
actually : nagatoro in another dimension being honest,shy and submissive
nagatoro in another dimension

Yh the ntr imagination takes a whole lot of chapters when it's irrelevant to the story. And the story is kinda confusing but from what i understand is his father is also fucking his granny so rumina is both his aunt and sister. Is that right?
you thought it was NTR but it was pretty wholesome :3
Im glad its getting translated, really loved every doujin this author done
Want more of this hoping they make a sqeual
This can be best summarized in the next word: BRUH 😂
Confusion of da highest orda
True, the pseudo NTR is unnecessary and annoying. It's fine as a thought, but actually producing that whole scene is crazy. Haha. Not good for Vanilla Fags like me.

So I realized who the author of this one is and started conecting the dots. I feel like there is some missing chapter to give context on how we went from the story of a horny couple to the Alabama showdown we have here now. Still, good fap from the most confused boner i've ever had.

the vibes are all over the place, the author has an unnecessary tendency to add pseudo ntr stories in his doujins, either go full NTR or don't, none of this half assed shit, it's like not NTR enough for NTR fans but too much NTR for vanilla fans, it's not pleasing anybody.
they had us in the 1st half ngl

At first I was mad. I thought it was NTR
Not only your womb, your virginity is exclusive for husband
The Bloodline's just one big circle. Now the mother and Grandmother are gonna share the same grandkids

@Good Shit I'm pretty sure the one you're actually looking for is 242678. Even though I never knew one with such a similar situation existed (the one @whocaresabout suggested), imo this one is much better.
I'm pretty sure the girl in the porn scene was the father fucking the grandmother as well. The author is a goddamn genious.
Amazing.
The father is author self inert char
When the family tree is a recycling symbol

so...
mc is the kid of the 2 people from the other stories...his mother had a sister, which the father fucked...so the sister is both an aunt and sister...which the MC fucked.

holy shit this is confusing as shit
What the actual fuck just wtf

Lemme Fuckin Get this straight So MC is the son of the 2 idiot couple in the authors previous works his mother has a sister which is the MC's Aunt BUT his Father Fucked His Wife's mother Therefor Giving birth to his now aunt so his aunt is Legally and In Bloodline terms his pure blood big sister which he fucked   how tf did we get here the Father is either a Sigma Male or a Madlad Chad
The imagination of this guy is beyond DMT's capability lmao

10/10 
I pray so one day i get a shorstack (～￣▽￣)～
When she started talking to Balls-kun and Mr. Penis, I cracked up- yet managed to maintain my erection. Not many doujin can do that. :3
Veri good 👍 even at 4am..
Alabama amiright
Hooooly shit
@Toalbooth lmaooo
LONG LONG MAAAAAAAN!
Even at page 2 it says NTR misunderstanding 1st time hearing that kind
@ohnodonttell  Huh.  Didn't realize that was Kousuke's parents.  Thought the artist just like drawing short, flak delinquent types.  This is definitely a new twist on that story.
LONG LONG MAAAAAANN
This is related to 314963? Crazy relationship diagram!
damn, nice!

So Kousuke's father banged his grandma so Rumina is born? now that explains the 30 yrs age gap of the siblings. Kousuke and Rumina being married won't add to the oddness of the family. Wait, despite all those sperms it failed to impregnate Rumina? just how weak is Kousuke's army is? well, at least Rumina accepted their fate as spouse already so their future as a married couple is set in stone.
Wait in which one did the dad pipe the grandma
@Good shit it's 259264
Since I'm needing help can anyone tell me the number of doujain where a guy gets reversed rape on a train
We need to be enlighten how his dad knocked up his mother's wife! Aaaaaaaaaayyy wanna see and read it!
Damn, they actually had the balls to give the age?!
That's even more kinky incest stuff, sister and aunt at the same time(should be younger sister, that would be even more fucked up)

So the parents are pretty clearly the couple from the author's previous series, what in the actual fuck is this bombshell that the dad fucked his wife's mom?? He was so dedicated to his wife in all that shit.
I mean yeah, how else would they be siblings and also nephew/aunt?
@ndus: yeop
So if I'm interpreting the diagram at the end correctly, MC's father knocked up his wife's mother... Neat.
